title: Strategic Tools for Alignment and Clarity
description:
These are the questions Nick and I will go over in this episode of Exotic Matter.

**Topics:**
- What makes visual tools like the Business Model Canvas and The Value Proposition Canvas so effective?
- At the end of a Workshop, how can you make sure clients do what they said they would?
- And what's the best way to actually begin running Customer Interviews?

[Nick Himowicz](https://www.linkedin.com/in/nickhimowicz/) is a Product Innovation Coach and a friend. After countless conversations and nerding out together on this stuff, I was sure he would be a phenomenal start to the inaugural season of Exotic Matter. I believe you'll agree.
